sub_title: Apparel Developer & Designer / Freelance / Project Management
summary: Product and ACC Developer, with a special focus in Ready-to-wear and Leather Garments. Throughout my career, I have worked as a Quality Assurance Specialist and as a Fashion Designer, which has allowed me to have a broad view of the fashion industry and its different aspects. I enjoy being challenged and experiencing new adventures, but with a dedication to structure and organisation.
